channel.title: Aurora Source | OldSchool RuneScape bot
channel.description:
I've decided to open-source the JavaFX version of Aurora that we released in Feb 2013 to see if it'll be useful to anyone. You can find it here: https://github.com/rvbiljouw/aurorabot
The thing is released under the GPLv2 license. I hope that whoever decides to make use of it will contribute back or give relevant credits. If anybody wants more details feel free to ask..

item.title: Aurora Source | OldSchool RuneScape bot
item.dc:creator: @_Rick1 _Rick
item.description:
@_Rick1 wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:544337”][quote author=greatpea link=topic=663218.msg4435470#msg4435470 date=1404952379]

Tobie Warburton authored on Jul 3, 2013

https://github.com/rvbiljouw/aurorabot/commit/b9b3394bc9de2333e46295e52ba815a2a50f9af8

???
[/quote]LOL.[/quote]

This happened when we merged with vInsert and all the shit got hacked because of their sloppy admin…
If you look at the code you’d see it was never released (didn’t compile) and was removed within minutes from it being committed.

Read full topic
